desc: Xela Aroma products are hand poured and individually assembled in Dallas, Texas.

layout.text:
Immerse yourself in the luxurious scents of Xela Aroma by Austin Street Center. Our hand-crafted experience allows you to choose a vessel and a fragrance which matches your mood. Your diffuser or soy-based candle will be hand poured, using the finest essential oils.
Not only will you receive a luxurious product, but your purchase also benefits the most vulnerable homeless served at Austin Street Center.
